body:
This is really a `NotImplementedError`, see the docs [here](http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/merging.html#joining-with-two-multi-indexes)

and can be done by the simple expedient of an actual merge.

```
In [43]: pd.merge(persons.age.reset_index(),activities.reset_index(),on=['hh_id','person_id']).set_index(['hh_id','person_id'])
Out[43]: 
                 age  activity_id    type  zone
hh_id person_id                                
0     0           45            0    work     5
      1           23            0    work     8
1     0           25            0    work     4
      0           25            1    work     5
      1           28            0    work     8
      2           33            0    shop     3
      2           33            1    shop     3
      2           33            2    shop     7
      3           36            0    shop     6
2     0           45            0    work     7
3     0           58            0  school     3
      0           58            1  school     9
4     0           58            0  school     5
      1           34            0    shop     7
      1           34            1    work     5
      1           34            2    work     9
      1           34            3    work     8
```

If you'd like to implement would be a welcome PR
this a dupe of #6360 , where a partial soln is implemented.
